abstract: The legal victory will probably block Roche from introducing an anemia drug in the United States and preserve Amgen’s nearly $7 billion franchise.
snippet: The legal victory will probably block Roche from introducing an anemia drug in the United States and preserve Amgen’s nearly $7 billion franchise.
lead_paragraph: Amgen won a decisive victory today in a closely watched patent infringement lawsuit against Roche, which will probably block Roche from introducing an anemia drug in the United States and preserve Amgen’s nearly $7 billion franchise.

headline.main: Amgen Wins a Crucial Patent Ruling
